RegionPush.Title: [EN] Notice about Pre-Download Availability
RegionPush.Message:
Hi Travelers!
HoYoVerse has done some changes to the pre-download system, which resulted in the removal of ZIP archive for pre-download.
This means that the pre-download feature is no longer available for the time being.
We are sorry for the inconvenience. A fix is underway, we will release an update to the launcher once validation is complete.
